institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 36 (Selection of Stadium)
contents: Article 36 (Selection of stadium) ① The stadium for local competitions shall be selected by the chairman of the city/provincial operation committee in consultation with the Chairman of the Korean Committee, taking into account the conditions of the venue, etc., ② The stadium for national competitions shall be selected by the Chairman of the Korean Committee, taking into account the conditions of the venue, etc. It is selected in consultation with the chair of the city/provincial management committee., ③ Public institutions (organizations) must be used first as stadiums for domestic competitions, and except in special cases, private academies cannot be used as stadiums, and only those who wish to use private academies as stadiums In this case, a written explanation must be written. ④ The stadium must be selected within the minimum range, taking into account the number of participating players by occupation, game operation conditions, budget requirements, etc.
